The  “Jesucristo Es Mi Modelo” communal bank is made up of 11 charismatic and entrepreneurial women who are in their seventh loan cycle. Carmen is 55 years old and is married with 2 independent children. She began by making food and was able to save enough to then set up her shop, where she sells everyday groceries. 

She used the loan she asked for to buy sweets and drinks. Her dream is to be able to strengthen her business.

The “Jesucristo Es Mi Modelo” group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for helping them to progress.

In the photo Carmen is in the back row, third from the left, in the grey t-shirt and black jacket.

loans.use: to buy sweets and drinks.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa, se encuentra descapitalizada y solicita capital para seguir trabajando y dando una buen servicio a sus clientes, invertirá en la compra de carnes, arroz, frijol, verduras, y mobiliario, de esta manera tendrá los recursos para seguir elaborando la comida que vende y dará una mejor imagen de su local.
Con la inversión del préstamo anterior fortaleció el comedor con la materia prima para seguir preparando la comida, lo que le ayudo a tener economía estable para darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y cancelo deudas.
texts.en:
Rosa is in a situation of having no capital and is asking for capital so she can continue working and providing a good service to her customers. She will buy meat, rice, beans, vegetables and furniture. By doing this she will have sufficient resources to carry on making the food she sells and improve the appearance of her diner. 

Rosa used the previous loan to build up the diner by buying the raw ingredients to continue making the food, which helped her to stabilise her finances so she could give her family better living conditions and pay off her debts.

loans.use: to buy meat, rice, beans, vegetables and furniture.

loans.name: Carmen Elena

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer activa y luchadora, que siempre va en busca de oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante en compañía de su esposo y sus dos hijos.
Durante su vida productiva trabajó en diferentes cafeterías y, con el ánimo de generar mejores ingresos y pasar más tiempo con su familia, decidió independizarse; razón por la que montó su propia tienda de abarrotes, en la que ofrece todo tipo de productos de la canasta familiar que son de primera necesidad, trabaja sola todos los días y desde que inició ha tenido muy buena acogida por parte de los habitantes del sector.
Su proyecto para el futuro a mediano plazo es ampliar y fortalecer aún más su negocio, por ello solicita el crédito como apoyo para realizar adecuaciones locativas necesarias (pintar, cambiar vitrinas deterioradas), esto le dará una mejor imagen al negocio, atrayendo nueva clientela que aumentará sus ventas y por ende, el margen de utilidades, esto le dará la capacidad para seguir apoyando a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y seguir reinvirtiendo en su actividad generadora de recursos para llegar a cumplir su sueño y poder dar a sus hijos una educación universitaria de calidad para que se conviertan en profesionales íntegros y exitosos.
texts.en:
Carmen is an energetic and determined woman, who is always in search of opportunities to get ahead, alongside her husband and their two children.

From the time she was able to work, she has worked in several cafeterias, but in order to improve her income and to be able to spend more time with her family, she decided to start her own business. She set up a grocery store, which offers all kinds of groceries that are basic necessities. She works alone every day and since starting her business, it was been very well received by the neighbourhood. 

Her medium-length plan for the future is to expand and further strengthen her business. To do so, she is requesting a loan to make necessary renovations (to paint and to change deteriorated display cabinets). This will improve the appearance of her business, attracting new customers. This will, in turn, increase her sales and her profit margin. This will enable her to continue to assist her husband with household expenses and to continue reinvesting in her business to fulfill her dream. It will also enable her to give her children a quality college education so that they become successful professionals.

loans.use: to make necessary renovations (to paint and to change deteriorated display cabinets).

loans.name: Mukaram

texts.ru:
Мукарам родилась и выросла в сельской местности.  Так как животноводство является одним из основных видов деятельности  жителей села Мукарам не по наслышке знает  как ухаживать за домашним скотом .  Ей сейчас 42 года она замужем и имеет  четверых детей. Ее семья также как и многие занимается разведением скота и переработкой молока. Муж занимается грузовыми перевозками. Старший сын уехал на заработки. Остальные дети помогают родителям в семье.  
В будущем чтобы дать хорошее образование детям,  и женить их достойно, семье надо расширять бизнес.    С наступлением холодов также надо запастись кормами на зиму.  Знакомые посоветовали  Мукарам  взять кредит в МДО «Арванд»  . Мукарам решила получить кредит с Арванд и подала заявку. На полученный кредит она планирует закупить корм для скота.  Она заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mukaram was born and raised in a rural area.  Since animal husbandry is one of the main types of work among the residents of her village, she has more than just heard about how to take care of cattle.  Mukaram is now 42 years old, married, and has four children.  Her family, like many others, is in the business of raising cattle and producing milk.  Her husband is in the transport business.  Her eldest son moved away to find work.  The remaining children help Mukaram and her husband.

In order to provide her children with an education one day and to properly marry them off, the family has to expand its business, and with the oncoming cold season, they have to stock up on feed for the winter.  Some of her acquaintances recomended that she get a loan from MDO Arvand.  Mukaram decided to take out a loan from MDO Arvand and submitted her application.  She plans to use the funds to buy livestock feed in bulk.  She would like to thank MDO Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru:
Эту 32-летнюю улыбающуюся женщину зовут Дилрабо. У нее свой торговый бизнес. Она занимается продажей детской одежды на рынке своего района Кубадиён. Дилрабо начала данный бизнес в возрасте 15 лет и уже 17 лет как она занимается этим. За эти годы она приобрела своих постоянных клиентов. Дилрабо очень ценит свой бизнес, так как за счет него она обеспечивает семью. Дилрабо замужем. У нее трое детей школьного возраста. Муж Дилрабо в данный момент находится в России на заработках. 
Сейчас Дилрабо просит кредит для покупки зимней детской одежды для развития торговли.
texts.en:
This smiling 32 year old woman is named Dilrabo.  She has her own retail business.  She sells children's clothes at the Qubadiyon regional market.  Dilrabo has been in this business for 17 years, having started it when she was 15 years old.  Over the years she has built up a loyal client base.  Dilrabo deeply appreciates her business since it provides for her family.  

Dilrabo is married and she has three school aged children.  Dilrabo's husband is currently working in Russia.  Dilrabo is requesting the loan to buy children's winter clothes in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to increase her sales by selling children's winter clothes

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru:
Эту милую женщину зовут Нигора. Ей 32 года. Нигора замужем. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации на заработках. Нигора решила заняться скотоводством. Эта леди на вид хрупкая женщина, но она не боится трудностей. Нигора уверенна, что сможет ухаживать за скотами и начать собственный бизнес. 
   Она уверенна потому что с ранних лет она помогала своим родителям по работе на скотном дворе и уже знает очень много о деятельности животноводства. У Нигоры уже есть коровник, которого Вы можете увидеть на фотографии и она успела запастись сеном и другими видами корма на зиму. 
  Нигора просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько голов скота, чтобы начать свой бизнес. Она надеется на свою удачу. Нигора верит, что сможет начать бизнес и в будущем развить свою деятельность.
texts.en:
This kind woman is named Nigora.  She is 32 years old and married.  Her husband works in Russia.  Nigora has decided to go into the cattle business.   She may appear to be a fragile lady, but she isn't afraid of any difficulty.  Nigora is sure that she can care for cattle and start her own business.  She is sure because she started to help her parents in their cattle business when she was very young.  Now she knows a great deal about animal husbandry.   She owns a barn, which you can see in the photograph, and she has stocked up for the winter with hay and other types of feed.

Nigora is requesting a loan in order to buy several head of cattle to start her business.  She is relying on her own good fortune.  Nigora believes that she can start her business and expand it in the future.

loans.use: to buy a couple of head of cattle to start her business

loans.name: Virgen De Guadalupe De Santa Clara Group

texts.es: Yris  de  35 años de edad soltera y con 1  hijo, yris   trabaja en el servicio de moto taxis   hace unos  5  años.  Yris  con la ayuda de su familia a sabido salir adelante tanto así que  ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener su casa propia .Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar algunos repuestos para la moto taxi y    seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Yris  y  todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado    y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Yris   está parada se le distingue por su bebe que tiene en brasos.   Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en: Yris is 35 years old, single and has a son. She has driven a mototaxi for five years. With the help of her family she has been able to make enough headway to build a customer base that has generated income to cover the bills. In the future she would like to have her own home. She plans to use the loan to purchase some spare parts for her mototaxi and continue meeting the needs of her customers so she can be able to make progress. Yris and all of her fellow members are grateful for the Kiva loan and for the confidence placed in them. Yris is holding her baby in the photo, and she promises to achieve all of her goals.

loans.use: buy spare parts for a mototaxi.

loans.name: Betulia

texts.es:
Doña Betulia es una microempresaria, vive en una  Comunidad de Trojes al  oriente de Honduras, se dedica a la venta y elaboración  de rosquillas, hojaldras y quesadillas.
Doña Beulia tiene su negocio ubicado en su casa de habitación y con su negocio satisface las necesidades de su familia, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de materia prima como harina, soda, leche, huevos, etc.
Doña Beulia espera que esta inversión le permita tener más productos para la venta y así generarse ingresos que le ayuden a salir adelante en su negocio y en su hogar. 
Doña Betulia su sueño es tener un negocio más grande y mejorar su casa.

Trojes, Honduras - Noviembre del 2013.
texts.en:
Betulia is a small businesswoman who lives in a community in Trojes to the east of Honduras. She earns a living making and selling "rosquillas" [traditional ring-shaped biscuits], pastries and quesadillas. Betulia runs her business at her home and this enables her to satisfy all of the family's needs.

She is asking for the loan to buy raw ingredients such as flour, baking soda, milk, eggs etc. Betulia hopes the loan will allow her to have more products to sell and so generate income which will help her to make progress in the business and in the home.

Betulia's dream is to have a bigger business and improve her home.

Trojes, Honduras - November 2013.

loans.use: to buy flour, baking soda, milk, eggs etc. for her business.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina continua dedicándose a la venta de productos de agro veterinarios como fertilizantes, semillas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a  este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono.
texts.en:
Luz Marina still earns a living selling agricultural/veterinary products such as fertilizers and seeds. She has been in this business for several years now and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

On this occasion she needs the loan to buy manure.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Yuri Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yuri, es una persona que se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, es casada, tiene tres hijos de 12, 17 y 18 años de edad, todos están estudiando y en sus tiempo libre apoyan a su madre en atender la pupuseria, es un negocio que aprendió de su madre, lo atiende de desde hace 2 años y tienen un horario de 3:00 p.m. hasta 9:00 p.m., todos los días.
Invertirá en la compra de aderezos, chicharrón, quesillo, bebidas, verduras, etc. son ingredientes que Yuri necesita para tener su negocio funcionando y seguir generando los ingresos con los cuales cubre los gastos familiares, espera tener un aumento en sus ganancias, ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Sueña con dar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida, continuar fortaleciendo su negocio y salir de sus deudas.
texts.en: Yuri is a person who is concerned about the well-being of her family. She is married and has three children ages 12, 17 and 18, all of whom are in school and in their free time help their mother tend to her pupusa (stuffed tortillas) stand. Yuri learned the business from her mother and has had the stand for two years, working from 3-9 p.m. every day. She plans to purchase seasonings, crackling, cheese, drinks, vegetables and other ingredients she needs to have a functioning business and generate income to pay the bills. She hopes to increase her profits and offer a better service to her customers. She dreams of giving her family a better quality of life, strengthening her business and eliminating her debt.

loans.use: to purchase seasonings, crackling, cheese, drinks, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Las Abejitas-Chupaca Group

texts.es:
NOEMI ES UNA DE LAS SOCIAS DEL GRUPO LAS ABEJITAS - CHUPACA, SE CARACTERIZA POR QUE ES MUY ALEGRE Y TRABAJADORA
ELLA TIENE 25 AÑOS Y TIENE 02 HIJOS DE 7 Y 11 AÑOS DE EDAD, QUE AÚN ESTAN ESTUDIANDO.

NOEMI LLEVA TRABAJANDO HACE 02 AÑOS CON EL GRUPO, LE GUSTA PERTENECER A ESTE  POR QUE TODOS SON MUY TRABAJADORES Y MUY PUNTUALES EN EL PAGO DE SUS CUOTAS.
ELLA VENDE VERDURAS POR MAYOR Y MENOR EN EL MERCADO DE SU LOCALIDAD.
GRACIAS A LAS VENTAS DE SUS PRODUCTOS AYUDA A SU CONVIVIENTE PARA MANTENER A SUS PEQUEÑOS HIJOS.

EL PRESTAMOS QUE ELLA A OBTENIDO LO INVERTIRÁ EN LA COMPRA DE SUS PRODUCTOS YA QUE POR ESTAS FIESTAS NAVIDEÑAS LAS VENTAS INCREMENTAN.
NOEMI SE SIENTE MUY CONTENTA AL SABER QUE PERSONAS DE OTRO PAIS LA APOYAN INCONDICIONALMENTE, SIN CONOCERLA.

ELLA VISTE UN GORRO CREMA Y CHOMPA CELESTE, ES LA PRIMERA DE LA DERECHA.
texts.en:
Noemi is one of the members of the Las Abejitas - Chupaca communal bank.  She is known for being very happy and hardworking.  She is 25 years old and has two children, ages 7 and 11, who are still studying.

Noemi has been with the group for two years.  She likes belonging to the communal bank because everyone is very hardworking and punctual in making their payments.

She sells vegetables wholesale and retail in the local market.  Thanks to the sales of her produce, she helps her partner to take care of their young children.

She will invest the loan that she received in the purchase of her products, because sales increase during the Christmas season.  Noemi is very happy to know that people from another country are supporting her unconditionally, without ever meeting her.

She is wearing a cream hat and blue sweater (in the photo); she is the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes, lettuce, carrots, etc.

loans.name: Nim

texts.en:
Nim lives in Baray district with his wife and 2 children. Nim has been a farmer and a construction worker for years. He usually manages his farming work in rainy season and provides renovation service in the rest season. Nim has gained a good reputation among locals who value the high quality work that he does. 

Nim would like a loan in order to buy woods for renovating his own home as it’s not comfortable for his family. In this way, he will be able to safeguard the family and provide them with happiness of having a suitable shelter to live as other locals do. The loan will be a great help for Nim, and he hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to buy woods for renovating his own home.

loans.name: Tajibu

texts.ru: Тажибу 50 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитала детей, дети все самостоятельные, проживают отдельно. Старший сын находится на заработках в России, ежемесячно высылает деньги матери. У Тажибу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Тажибу занимается животноводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 8,400 сом KGS, были закуплены 10 овец. Благодаря упорному труду Тажибу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 2 нетели и 25 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тажибу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тажибу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Tajibu is 50 years old and a widow.  After her husband's death, she alone raised their children.  Her children are now all independent and have moved out of her house.  Her eldest son moved to Russia to find work and sends money to his mother every month.  Tajibu has a secondary level educaiton and her familiy's main income has been from the animal husbandry business she started 13 years ago with the purchase of 10 sheep at a cost of 8,400 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today Tajibu has 3 milk cows, 2 heifers, and 25 sheep.  Her monthly income totals 15,000 som (KGS).  

With an aim to further developing her business, Tajibu applied to microfinance bank Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in order to expand the size of her herd with a purchase of cows.  Tajibu plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Lesly

texts.es:
Lesly tiene una edad de 38 años con un grado de estudio de primaria completa la cual pudo completar gracias al apoyo financiero y moral por parte de sus padres a quien ella agradece mucho por las muchas enseñanzas en su vida. Fue su esposo quien le enseñara a trabajar la tierra quien es herrero y agricultor enseñándole la siembra de maíz, frijol y yuca desde hace más de 10 años siendo esta la actividad principal de ingresos para su familia y hogar. Ella es madre de tres hijos quienes son menores de edad y 2 de ellos aún no tiene la edad para estudiar por lo que solo el mayor está en preescolar. Los planes para el futuro son los de poder cultivar café para el próximo año y dedicarse a este rubro ya que las ganancias son mayores creando viveros de café, tratando de vender el producto con un valor agregado entre otras ideas que ella y su esposo tienen para generar mayores ganancias. Sus sueños ampliar sus cultivos de maíz, frijol y yuca lograr para el próximo año mejoras en cuanto a la comercialización del mismo. Apoyar a su esposo con la elaboración de herradura para caballos, machetes, azadones, entre otros de manera que los ingresos para el bienestar y los estudios de sus hijos sean los mejores para que ellos puedan prepararse.      
Lesly ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que dará asistencia a su milpa de maíz más la compra de un cangre de yuca para sembrar ya que de esta manera ella espera obtener una cosecha asistida y más amplia para la venta en la próxima temporada.
texts.en:
Lesly is 38 years old and has completed her primary education thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents, whom she is very grateful to for everything they have taught her in life. It was her husband who taught her how to farm the land. He is a blacksmith and farmer and more than 10 years ago taught her how to grow corn, beans and yucca. This is the main source of income for her family and household.

Lesly has three young children. One of them is at pre-school but the other two are too young to go to school. Her plans for the future are to grow coffee next year and concentrate on this crop since the profits are better. She plans to have a coffee nursery and try to sell the product with added value. This is one of the ideas which she and her husband have for generating more profits. They hope to increase their corn, bean and yucca crops and have improved sales of these in the coming year. She helps her husband making horse shoes, machetes, mattocks and other items so they can have as much income as possible for the wellbeing and schooling of their children so they can be well educated.

Lesly has asked the COMIXMUL cooperative for a loan to buy agricultural supplies so she can tend her corn crop and also buy yucca shoots to plant. By doing this she hopes to have a bigger and good quality harvest to sell next season.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and yucca to grow.

loans.name: Narzullo

texts.ru:
Нарзулло молодой и счастливый отец двоих детей. Ему 25 лет. Он с женой и детьми живет на районе Шахристон. Его жена дома присматривает за детьми и ухаживает за скотами пока ее муж на работе. Нарзулло водитель грузовой машины. Он предоставляет услуги по перевозки тяжелых вещей и грузов. Его работа помогает ему обеспечить свою семью. 
  Нарзулло научился водить машину у отца. И уже 5 лет водить машину стало для него профессией. Нарзулло решил расширить свою деятельность, то есть купить более большую машину, чтобы возить больше грузов. Он хочет купить машину марки "Портер". К сожалению чтобы приобрести такую машину у него не хватает средств, поэтому он просит Вас помочь. Нарзулло верит и надеется, что найдутся люди такими отзывчивыми как он и помогут ему.
texts.en:
Narzullo is a young and happy father of two children.  He is 25 years old, and lives in the Shahriston region with his wife and children.  His wife stays home to look after their children and cattle while Narzullo is working.  Narzullo drives a freight vehicle and offers the service of transporting heavy items and loads.  His work helps him to provide for his family.  He learned how to drive from his father and he has been driving for 5 years.  He has already become a professional in this field. 

Narzullo has decided to expand his business by buying a larger vehicle with which to carry larger loads.  He wants to by a "Porter" brand vehicle, but unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money to do this.  So he is asking you for help.  Narzullo hopes and believes that people as charitable as himself will turn out and help him.

loans.use: to buy a freight vehicle

loans.name: Nozimjon

texts.ru: Нозимчону 25 лет. Он из Худжанда. Нозимчон женатый мужчина. В браке у него есть двое детей. Жена Нозимчона не работает она домохозяйка и присматривает детьми. Нозимчон один обеспечивает семью. Он работает водителем маршрутки. Такой деятельностью он занимается уже 2 года. Нынешняя его машина имеет 7 пассажирских мест. Он хочет купить маршрутку марки "Газель" с больше мест для пассажиров. У Нозимчона для такой покупки нет достаточных денег, и он решился взять кредит. Нозимчон планирует купить машину и будет работать много но он уверен, что несмотря на работу он найдет время для своей жены и детей. Нозимчону нужна Ваша поддержка.
texts.en: Nozimjon is 25 years old and from Khujand.  He is married and has two children.  Nozimjon's wife doesn't work outside of the home.  She is a homemaker and looks after the children.  Nozimjon alone provides for the family.  He drives a fixed-route taxi.  He has been in this business for 2 years.  His current vehicle has room for 7 passengers.  He wants to buy a "Gazelle" brand vehicle that has seats for more passengers.  Since he doesn't have enough money for this purchase, he has decided to take out a loan.  Nozimjon plans to buy the vehicle and to work a lot, but he is sure that even so, he will find time for his wife and children.  Nozimjon needs your support.

loans.use: to buy a Gazelle brand vehicle

loans.name: Yoqubjon

texts.ru: Ёкубчон ювелир и продавец ювелирных изделий. Он зарабатывает этим на жизнь и за счет прибыли обеспечивает свою семью. У него жена, 18-летняя дочь и трое сыновей в возрасте 16, 8 и 5 лет. Ёкубчон в своем магазине продает национальные серьги, кольца и цепочки из серебра, а также ремонтирует ювелирные изделия. Он занимается данной деятельностью более 10 лет. Его ювелирный магазин (мастерская) расположена на главном рынке города Душанбе. В данный момент Ёкубчон хочет расширить свой бизнес и с такой целью обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита он собирается купить разнообразный ассортимент серебряных изделий для увеличения продаж. Ёкубчон думает о будущем своих детей и работает усердно, чтобы его дети получили образование в школе и в дальнейшем в ВУЗе.
texts.en:
Yoqubjon is a jeweler and sells pieces of jewelry.  He earns his living and provides for his family with the profits.  He has a wife, an 18 year old daughter and three sons, aged 16, 8, and 5 years.  Yoqubjon sells traditional earrings, rings, and chains made from silver.  He also repairs jewelry.  He has been in this business for 10 years.  His workshop and store are located in Dushanbe's main market.  

Yoqubjon wants to expand his business and with this goal he has applied for a loan.  He plans to use the loan to buy an assortment of various silver jewelry items.  Yoqubjon thinks about his children's future and works tirelessly so that they can have an education, now in school, and later in an institution of higher learning.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry items for resale

loans.name: Salimata

texts.fr:
SALIMATA est mariée dans une famille polygame, mère de 4 enfants, elle est âgée de 39 ans et vit  à  Koutiala (région de Sikasso). Elle n’a pas eu la chance de faire des études, d’où son attachement aux activités commerciales depuis plus de 10 ans. Après avoir mené plusieurs activités sans réussite, elle finit par se lancer  dans la vente de tubercules, légumes et fruits. Elle  trouve que cette activité lui procure assez de revenus. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle, elle décida de  faire recours    l‘institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso il y a plus de 8 ans. Elle est à son 6ème prêt, les 5 précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 10 sacs de pomme de terre et 5 sacs d’ignames à Sikasso. Elle effectue sa vente au grand marché de Koutiala  à une clientèle  de femmes et d’hommes, au comptant ou à crédit.  
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 40.000 FCFA par mois qu’elle envisage utiliser pour le remboursement des intérêts de Soro, participer aux dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et investir le reste dans son activités.
texts.en:
Salimata is 39 years old, married in a polygamous family, and a mother of four children. She lives in Koutiala (Sikasso region). She did not have the chance to go to school.

Salimata has been working in the commercial sector for more than ten years. After having tried several different businesses without success, she started this business of selling tubers, vegetables, and fruits. She finds that she can earn enough with this work.

In order to satisfy her customers, Salimata, eight years ago, decided to join the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso. This is her sixth loan, and her previous five loans have all been repaid correctly.

With this new loan, she plans to buy 10 sacs of potatoes and five sacs of yams in Sikasso. She will make her sales in the main market of Koutiala to customers who are men and women, for cash and credit.

She hopes to earn a monthly profit of 40,000 francs CFA, with which she plans to repay the loan interest and support her family's everyday expenses. She will invest the rest back into her business.

loans.use: to buy tubers

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz is 56 years old from the town of Sikatuna, Bohol. She is married with three adult children. Her husband is a farmer and she works hard raising hogs for the last 13 years. This business earns her an average income of 4,000 PHP per month. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy feed, supplements, and additional piglets to raise. Her income will provide healthy meals for her and her husband. 

In the future, she hopes to continue doing business in a bigger way and save for future.

loans.use: to buy supplements, feed and piglets.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina, 29, lives in a village of Battambang province’s Sangke district, Cambodia. She has earned a living by growing rice and beans for five years. The current business earns about 68,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s need. 

Rina has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for three loan cycles and has successfully repaid the loans. She requests a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income from her current business and make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Savean's Group

texts.en:
Savean is a 51-year-old married woman with eight children who lives in a rural village of the Phnom Proek district. 

She has earned a living growing rice and beans for 13 years. She earns about 57,000 KHR per day to meet the family's needs. 

This is her second micro-loan with KIva's partner VisionFund. She is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Savean is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow more crops on her farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Kizilboy

texts.ru:
Кизилбой живет со своей семьей на районе Яван. Ему 46 лет. У него большая семья. Кизилбой отец шестерых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Двое его старших сына уехали на заработки в Россию. Трое дочерей и младший сын учатся в школе. 
     Кизилбой настоящий дехканин. Он занимается растениеводством более 12 лет, сажает овощи пшеницу и другие сельскохозяйственные культуры. К приходу зимы Кизилбой готовиться активно. Он решился взять кредит, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения, горючей смеси для трактора и семена. С такими средствами он собирается на часть земли посадить картошку, морковь и репку. На другую часть он посадить пшеницу. Когда у него будут удобрения, горючее и семена он сразу приступит к работе. Кизилбой очень надеется, что его поддержат, и он весной получит богатый урожай.
texts.en:
Kizilboy and his family live in the Yavan region.  He is 46 years old and he has a large family.  He is the father of 6 children.  His wife is a homemaker.  His two eldest children moved to Russia to find work.  His three daughters and his youngest son are all in school.  

Kizilboy is a real farmer.  He has been farming for 12 years, planting vegetables, wheat, and other crops.  Kizilboy is busy getting ready for winter.  He has decided to take out loan to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, and tractor fuel.  With these resources he will plant half of his land with potatoes, carrots, and onions.  He will plant wheat on the other half of his land.  Once he has the seed, fertilizer, and fuel, he will get right to work.  Kizilboy is really hoping to get this loan so that he can have a bountiful harvest in the spring.

loans.use: to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, and fuel

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a 43-year-old married woman from Tagbilaran, Bohol. She has two children who are 17 and 20 years old. Her husband is a carpenter and Lucia sell vegetables. She sells labong (bamboo shoots) and squash to her community and stores. This business started five years ago and she earns 7,000 PHP every month.

She hopes to buy more bamboo shoots, squash and other types of vegetables to resell.

In the future, she hopes to have a better return on her investment and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy bamboo shoots and squash.

loans.name: Vet's Group

texts.en: A citizen from a rural area located in the Moung Russey district, Battambang province, Vet is a 57-year-old married woman with seven children. She has grown rice for 25 years. Her current business earns  about 32,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. Vet has been with VisionFund for six cycles. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Vet is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to earn additional income and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Aisras

texts.en:
Aisras, 28, is married with five children and resides in a rural village of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She supports the family by growing cassava.  She also works for others for a fee. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

Aisras has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She successfully repaid the loan and used the money to better support her family. She is now applying for a loan to buy fertilizer for her cassava. 

She hopes to earn additional income from her current business and make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Siheang

texts.en:
Siheang is a 49-year-old mother of three children who lives in a rural village of the Ponhea Krek district, Cambodia.  She and her husband have grown rice and cassava for 29 years. The current business earns her about 54,000 KHR per day. 

This is her second micro-loan  with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She asks for a loan to buy fertilizer for her cassava. She hopes that this loan will enable her to earn more income and make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru: Саодат 43-летняя замужняя женщина, занятая в сфере торговли. У нее четверо детей. Старший сын находится на заработках в России, а двое дочерей и младший сын учатся в школе. Саодат уже год как занимается продажей востребованных хозяйственных товаров в своем районе Кубадиён. Ей в торговле помогает старшая дочь. Саодат сейчас обратилась за кредитом, чтобы закупить ассортимент необходимых хозяйственных товаров и пополнить пустые полки в своем магазине.
texts.en:
Saodat is 43 years old, married, and in the retail business.  She has four children.  Her eldest son is working in Russia, but her two daughters and youngest son are in school.  For the last year, Saodat has been selling high-demand household goods in her native Qubadiyon region.  Her eldest daughter helps her with the business. 

Saodat has applied for a loan to buy up an assortment of necessary household goods and fill up the empty shelves in her store.

loans.use: to buy household goods

loans.name: Sarorm's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of Kandal province’s Kandal Stoeng district, Sarorm is a 54-year-old married man with three children. For more than 24 years, he and his wife have grown rice and worked for others for a fee. Their current business earns about 43,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Sarorm has been with VisionFund for fifteen cycles and he wisely and successfully used the loans to improve his living conditions. He is leading his group to ask for a loan and will use his portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for his farmland. 

He hopes to earn more income from his farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for his farmland.

loans.name: Sophal's Group

texts.en:
Sophal, aged 56, lives in a rural village of the Kandal Stoeng district and has two children. She grows rice and her husband is a construction worker. She has been in this business for 32 years and earns about 54,000 KHR per day to support her family. 

Sophal has been with VisionFund for three cycles. She successfully repaid previous loans which have helped her better conduct her business. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sophal is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. 

She hopes to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Lok's Group

texts.en:
Lok is a 61-year-old married woman who lives with her family in a rural area located in the Sangke district of Battambang province. She has five children. 

She has grown rice for 11 years and earns about 63,000 KHR per day to support her family. 

This is her third loan with VisionFund. She has used the previous loans wisely to improve her family’s livelihood. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Lok is going to use her portion to pay to harvest rice. This loan will enable her to extend her farmland and increase her rice production.  This will help to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to pay to harvest rice.

loans.name: Chreb

texts.en:
Chreb is 28 years old and widowed. She resides in Moung Rusey district in Battambong province. She earns a living growing rice and selling grocery items. She has done this for ten years and earns enough profit to have a proper life. 

She has three previous loans  with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) which helped her business to grow. She requests 4,000,000 KHR to pay reaping fees and to buy more grocery items. 

She hopes to improve her living conditions and standard of living.

loans.use: to pay reaping fees and buy more grocery items.

loans.name: Allah  Rakhi

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi, age 42, is a married woman and the mother of seven children. For about two years, she is been working doing hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to Kashf Foundation to buy reels of threads in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for their embellishment. In this way she will be able to cater to more customers consistently. 

She is hopeful that she will get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. Allah Rakhi dreams of a bright future for her children and desires to build her own house as she is living in a rented house with her family. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Nabila

texts.en:
Nabila is a 31-year-old woman; she has been providing services of cooking for many years. Nabila enjoys making food and has become famous in her town for proving these facilities and makes enough to lead a decent life. She takes orders from nearby hotels and people of her community. 

Nabila is a responsible mother and needs to earn more to bear daily expenditures of her family members. That is why she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy a stock of flour and rice along with packs of oil and salt at lower rates from the market. It will enable her to inflate her sales which ultimately helps in generating more cash. Nabila wishes to utilize her earned profit on expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of flour and rice along with packs of oil and salt.

loans.name: Hawa Group

texts.en:
This group is called Hawa, and consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. The group has applied for a loan of 140,000 Yemeni Riel from AMB. 

Aisha is 33 years old and married. She has been working as a vendor and has been selling food. She started her business with a small amount of capital and would now like to increase her sales volume .She would like to spend her time selling more products in order to increase her profit. She has requested a loan in order to purchase more stock to sell, such as potatoes, cooking oil and flour. She hopes to expand her business to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell, such as potatoes, cooking oil and flour.

loans.name: Tehmina

texts.en:
Tehmina, age 35, is a married woman and the mother of five children. She has been running business selling cloths for many years. She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloths in different colors and designs. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; currently she requested a loan of PKR 25,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season, taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she will be able to earn more income through her greater sales. 

She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a married woman with two school-going children. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past three years, she has operated a food stall business, preparing various foods such as rice, flat bread, beans and sells them to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. 

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase wheat flour, rice, beans, cooking  oil and charcoal for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, rice, beans, cooking  oil and charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Claudia Alejandra

texts.es: Claudia, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera, vive con su madre en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Claudia lleva dos años de haber establecido su propio negocio, donde ofrece los servicios de tinte de pelo, alisados, secado, planchado, manicure y pedicure. El negocio lo tiene en su casa y ya tiene buena clientela. Solicita un segundo ciclo de préstamo a la institución por 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual va invertir en la compra de tintes, champú, esmaltes, limas, cremas, talcos, tratamientos y otros, con el propósito de mantener productos que va ocupar en el salón y ofrecer un mejor servicio. Su meta es lograr satisfacer las necesidades básicas.
texts.en: Claudia is 21 years old. She is single and she lives with her mother in the town of Choloma, Cortes. Claudia has had her own business for two years, where she offers hair coloring services, hair straightening, styling, manicures and pedicures. She has the business in her house and has a good clientele. She is asking for a second cycle loan from the institution for 15,000 Lempiras. With it, she is going to invest in buying dyes, shampoo, nail polish, files, creams, powders, treatments and more, in order to keep products that she is going to use in the salon and offer better service. Her goal is to meet basic needs.

loans.use: to buy dyes, shampoo, nail polish, files, creams, powders, treatments and more.

loans.name: Jorge Fausto

texts.es: Jorge Fausto mayor de edad soltero, originario de uno de los municipios de chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, zona donde predomina el comercio, se caracteriza por ser un hombre responsable, trabajador,con muchos deseos de superación personal, es un microempresario el cual se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como: variedades estilos de ropa para niños, damas y adultos, zapatos, cosméticos, entre otros, sus compras las realiza al contado en mercados de mayoreos, y sus ventas son al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y clientes eventuales los cuales recupera semanal o quincenal todo esto de forma ambulante y por encargos, las mayorías de sus clientes son de zona rurales, por lo que su jornada diaria empieza desde muy temprano para lograr abastecer a todos sus clientes, el objetivo de este crédito es para capital de trabajo en el compra de mercadería en general como: cosméticos, productos plásticos, pantalones, blusas, faldas, shores, cremas faciales, entre otros. Jorge Fausto esta muy agradecido con el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Jorge Fausto is a single adult, from a municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country where trade is predominant. He can be described as a responsible and hardworking man, with a strong desire for self-improvement. He is a micro-entrepreneur who buys and sells merchandise in general such as the following: varied styles of clothing for children, women, and adults, shoes, cosmetics, and other items. He purchases in cash at wholesale markets, and sells in cash and on credit to regular and occasional customers, collecting money weekly or biweekly. All this business is done as traveling sales and by order. Most of his customers live in rural areas, so his workday begins very early to allow him to supply them all. 

The purpose of this loan is for working capital to buy merchandise in general such as cosmetics, plastic products, pants, blouses, skirts, shorts, and facial creams, among other items. Jorge Fausto is very grateful for the help that the Kiva lenders give to people with scarce resources.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in general such as shoes, pants, blouses, cosmetics, and other items

loans.name: Damaris Cristina

texts.es:
Damaris Cristina es una joven estudiante de Odontología, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Hola, mi nombre es Damaris , tengo 25 años, soy dominicana, nací y crecí en Moca  provincia Espaillat, tengo 5 hermanos y soy soltera, trabajo para ayudar a mis padres con los gastos de la casa ya que ellos no trabajan. 
Quiero estudiar Odontología en la Universidad Católica Tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI) La Vega RD,  deseo desarrollarme en esta carrera porque en verdad me gusta mucho y quiero poder ayudar a aquellas personas que realmente lo necesitan, mi familia y a mi comunidad; una buena  salud bucal es muy importante y debemos educar a la sociedad de todos los beneficios ya que los dominicanos tenemos escasa cultura de chequeos odontológicos preventivo.
He cursado 3 cuatrimestres y cada día me enamoro más de mi carrera. Este préstamo para mí es muy necesario porque con el  puedo cumplir mis metas, ser profesional y ser un cambio más  a mi país. 
Mi deseo es graduarme con las mejores notas, poder sobresalir profesionalmente, después de que termine mi carrera quiero trabajar en mi profesión como odontologa en el sector público; iniciar un proyecto de ayuda a los más necesitados de toda mi provincia que tanto lo necesita y especializarme en  el área de rehabilitación bucal.
texts.en:
Damaris Cristina is a young dentistry student. She is asking for a loan to cover her education expenses. This is her story: Hello, my name is Damaris. I am 25 years old and Dominican. I was born and raised in Moca, Espaillat province. I have 5 siblings and I am single. I work to help my parents, since they don't work. 
 
I want to study dentistry in the Universidad Católica Tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI) La Vega RD. I want to do this major because I really like it and I want to be able to help those who need it, my family and my community. Good oral health is very important and we have to educate society of all of the benefits, since we Dominicans don't have much of a culture of doing preventative dental care. 

I have done 3 trimesters and every day I fall more in love with my major. This loan is very necessary for me because with it I can meet my goals of being professional and being one more change in my country. What I want is to graduate with the best grades, and be able to get ahead professionally. After I finish my dentistry major, I want to work as a dentist in the public sector, start a project to help the neediest in my whole province, and specialize in the area of oral rehabilitation.

loans.use: to cover education expenses.

loans.name: Carmen Sagrario

texts.es:
Doña Carmen tiene una edad de 42 años, ella se dedica a la producción y cultivo de café en un estado civil de unión libre siendo su pareja maestro de educación primaria ya que al salir de sus actividades estudiantiles se dirige al campo donde ayuda a su compañera de hogar en las diferentes actividades que son llevadas a cabo. De su relación tiene un hijo el cual es menor vive y depende de ellos en todos los aspectos. Su experiencia se basa en tres años ya que aprendió por parte de su esposo a cultivar granos básicos como café, maíz y frijol pero sus ingresos económicos por parte de la agricultura solo dependen del café y del ingreso por la venta de resina siendo su mercado las personas que viven en la localidad e intermediarios. Su lugar de trabajo está ubicado a 15 kilómetros de distancia desde su casa de habitación al cual se traslada en auto bus para dar asistencia y mantenimiento a los mismos. 
Sus metas ayudar a su hijo en sus estudios, convertirlo en un profesional que tenga múltiples opciones en la vida y que la misma pueda enfrentarla de manera favorable.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abono, foliares, fungicidas entre otros que ayudaran al cuidado y protección de sus cultivos de café para esta temporada.
texts.en:
Carmen is 42 years old and raises coffee.  She is in a common law marriage and her husband teaches elementary school and goes to the fields when he is done teaching for the day, in order to help his wife with the various activities.  They have a minor son who lives with and depends on them in all aspects.  She has three years’ experience and learned to raise basic grains, such as coffee, corn, and beans from her husband, but their income from farming only comes from coffee sales to the local people or to wholesalers.  Her work area is located 15 km from her house and she travels there by bus.

Her goals are to help her son with his education and turn him into a professional with many options in life so that he can face it favorably.

She is asking for a loan so she can buy farming supplies such as fertilizer, compost, seedlings, fungicides, and other things that will help with the care and protection of her coffee crops for the season.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Maria Apolonia

texts.es: María, tiene 54 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella lleva 7 años de dedicarse a su propio negocio de taller de confección de ropa como forros de muebles, sabanas, forros de camas y cortinas.  Realiza esta actividad en su casa. Ya ha solicitado varios prestamos para mantener el negocio, actualmente solicita 5,500 Lempiras para comprar materia prima como telas para elaborar cortinas y cameras y poder aumentar las ventas. Tiene como metas obtener mejores ganancias para ayudar a su familia económicamente y satisfacer las necesidades básicas.
texts.en:
María is 54 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with her husband. They have two children and live in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. She has had her own sewing shop for seven years, where she makes furniture covers, sheets, bedspreads and curtains. She does this in her home. She has already requested some loans to keep the business going. She is currently requesting 5,500 HNL to buy basic materials such as fabric to make curtains and bedding and so she can increase her sales. 

Her goals are to improve her profits so she can help her family financially and fulfill their basic needs.

loans.use: To buy basic materials such as fabric to make curtains and bedding.

loans.name: Nolbia Yesenia

texts.es: Nolbia, tiene 27 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella trabajo  por muchos años en una maquila, y cuando se quedo sin empleo decidió por su propio negocio, tiene un taller de costura donde confecciona ropa intima para damas. esta ropa la vende en el mercado local. Además vende desperdicios  que sacan las maquilas para reciclar, y obtiene otros ingresos. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo por 8,000 Lempiras para comprar una maquina de coser para confeccionar ropa intima, con el propósito de mejorar el acabado de sus prendas y aumentar las ventas. Su meta es ampliar y cambiar de lugar el negocio y separarlo  de su casa para trabajar mejor.
texts.en: Nolbia is 27 years old. She is married and has 3 children. She lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for many years in a factory and when she lost her job she decided to open her own business. She has a sewing workshop where she makes women's underwear.  She sells the clothing in the local market. She also sells scraps that come from the factories for recycling and she gets other income. She is asking for a second loan of 8,000 Lempiras to buy a sewing machine to make underwear so she can improve the finishings on her clothing and increase her sales. Her goal is to expand and change her place of business and separate it from her house so that she can work better.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make underwear for women that she can sell.

loans.name: Muhamad

texts.ru:
Мухамаду 29 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Мухамад занимается животноводством. Ранее он работал на временные работы в России. Не найдя постоянную работу он по просьбе своих братьев вернулся на родину и стал работать в сфере животноводства как и его братья. Мухамад ухаживает за скотами и берет от них молоко. Продажей молока, сметаны и домашнего кефира занимаются мама Мухамада и его жена. Мухамад не жалеет, что вернулся на Родину. Теперь у него есть определенная работа, и он может ею заниматься дома. Он находится рядом с семьей и родными людьми.
   У Мухамада малое количество коров и он хочет взять кредит и купить несколько коров, чтобы продажа молочных продуктов возросла. Тем самым возрастет и доход от его деятельности. И он сможет накопить денег для образования детей в школе.
texts.en:
Muhamad is 29 years old. He is married and has three children. Muhamad is involved in raising livestock. Previously, he worked for a time in Russia. Not finding permanent work, he returned to his home country at the request of his brothers and got involved in animal husbandry like his brothers. Muhamad tends to the cattle and takes milk from them. Muhamad's mother and wife are involved in selling, milk, sour cream, and homemade kefir. Muhamad does not regret that he returned to his home country. Now, he has some work, and he can do it from home. He is near his family and native people.

Muhamad has a small quantity of cattle and he wants to take a loan to buy several cows, in order to grow his sales of dairy products. While growing his sales, he will also increase his income from his activities. And he will be able to save money for his children's education in school.

loans.use: to buy a few head of cattle

loans.name: José Vicente

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 51 años de edad, padre de 4 hijos y vive en unión libre con su compañera sentimental.
Durante su vida productiva siempre ha trabajado como comerciante independiente, tiene una chaza ambulante hace 28 años, donde ofrece mecato, dulces, cigarrillos y minutos a celular; trabaja de 9 am a 7 pm todos los días, así ha generado los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos básicos de su familia.
El crédito que solicita desea invertirlo en la compra de surtido al por mayor (mecato, galletería, dulces, entre otros), así podrá tener más variedad de productos para satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes y así aumentar las ventas y los ingresos para familia.
José tiene como propósito seguir luchando para sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles una educación de calidad para que se conviertan en profesionales y tengan un futuro próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
José is a 51-year old who is a father to four children and is in a common-law partnership with his partner. Throughout his working life, he has always worked as an independent sales person, running a street stall for 28 years where he sells snacks, sweets, cigarettes and mobile phone minutes, he works every day from 9 am to 7 pm, therein generating enough money to cover his family's basic expenditure.

José wants to invest the loan that he is seeking in the purchase of bulk goods (snacks, biscuits, sweets and so on), in this way having a wider variety of goods to satisfy his customer's wishes and therein increase the sales and family profits.

José intends to continue fighting to get his children ahead in life and give them an education of quality so that they become professionals and have a successful and prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy stock in bulk (snacks, biscuits, sweets and so on).

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Умная  таджичка нуждается вашей поддержки. Ее зовут Нилуфар и ей 19 лет. Она из семьи простого рабочего. Ее родители работают упорно, но их доход не достаточно для оплаты обучения Нилуфара в колледже, так как 2 года назад она поступила в Медицинский колледж. Она является студенткой 2 курса и должна оплатить годовой договор. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты обучения в колледже. Она ждет и надеется на вашу доброту.
texts.en:
This clever young Tajik needs support. Her name is Nilufar and she is 19 years old. She comes from a family of simple workers. Her parents work hard, but their income is not enough to pay for Nilufar's education in college, since two years ago she enrolled in the Medical College. She is a 2nd year student and must pay tuition.

She is requesting a loan to pay college tuition.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Burhon

texts.ru: Бурхон родился в селе Куркат и по сей день проживает там. Бурхону 45 лет. Он трудолюбивый добрый человек. Женат. Имеет четверых детей. Дети у них взрослые, старший сын Бурхона уже самостоятельный молодой человек. Он в данный момент находиться за пределами страны, уехал на заработки в Россию. Жена Бурхона занимается воспитанием детей и по хозяйству дома. Как и все другие сельские жители семья Бурхона тоже занимаются животноводством т.е купля продажей скота. Но это не основная работа Бурхона. Бурхон имеет свою не большую точку в центре села. Его всегда тянуло к восточной кухне, любил вкусные блюда а главное ценил в них полезные вещества. Со временем желание и интересы Бурхона воплотились в его деятельность. Он начал производить и продавать наши национальные блюда. Также Бурхон выпикает всеми нами известную , любимую традиционную самбусу(пирожки с мясом), которое печется в специальной печки "тандыр". По работе ему помогает его жена. Но приготовлении самбусы Бурхон не доверяет никому, он сам их готовит. Клиенты очень довольны и рады что и в селе открылось такое место, где можно быстро и вкусно перекусить. У Бурхона дела пошли хорошо,бизнес потихоньку развивается. Бурхон в первую очередь благодарит МДО "Арванд". Так как взяв деньги в кредит он начинал свое дело и сотрудничает с этой организацией уже два года. Вот в очередной раз Бурхон хочет взять деньги в кредит для покупки несколько мешков муки и масло. Он выражает свою благодарность за поддержку и доверия!
texts.en:
Burhon was born in the village of Kurkat and to this day resides there. Burhon is 45 years old. He is a hardworking, kind person. He is married and has four children. His children are grown. Burhon's eldest son is already an independent young man. At the moment, he is out of the country, having left for work abroad in Russia. Burhon's wife is involved with raising the children and working around the household.

Like all rural residents, Burhon's family is also involved in raising livestock, that is, buying and selling cattle. But this is not Burhon's main job. Burhon has himself a small shop in the center of the village. He was always drawn to eastern cooking, loved the delicious dishes and most importantly the useful nutrients. Over time, Burhon's desires and interests have been fulfilled in his activities. He began to produce and sell our national dishes. Similarly, Burhon makes all of our famous, beloved traditional "sambusu" (meat pies), which he bakes in a special tandoor ovens. His wife helps him in this work. But for preparing sambusu, Burhon does not trust anyone; he prepares those himself. Customers are very pleased and glad that even in their village such a place can be found, where one can get a quick and tasty snack.

Burhon's work went well, and the business is slowly developing. Burhon first of all thanks MDO Arvand. Since he took money in a loan, he started his own business and has been working with this organization for two years. Here again Burhon wants to take a loan to purchase a few bags of flour and butter. He expresses his gratitude for the support and trust!

loans.use: to  buy flour and butter

loans.name: Dora Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dora, está acompañada, tiene dos hijas las cuales están estudiando, ella vive en casa alquilada, se dedica a vender ropa, es un oficio que aprendió por su cuanta debido a la necesidad de cubrir los gastos de su hogar, atiende su negocio todos los días de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., su puesto de venta lo tiene el una de las calles principales de la ciudad donde reside.
La inversión será para comprar camisas, blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones y ropa interior, para ambos sexos, con esto su negocio estará surtido para estas épocas navideñas en la que sus clientes tienen más exigencias, espera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, aumentar sus ventas, y mejorar sus ganancias con las que ira cancelando puntualmente sus cuotas.
Sueña con dar a sus hijas la oportunidad estudiar y superarse, ya que ella no la tuvo.
texts.en:
Dora has a partner and two children, who are in school.  Dora lives in a rented house and makes a living selling clothes, a trade she learned on her own as she needed to cover household costs.  She works every day from 7am until 5pm and has a stall in one of the main streets in her city.

Dora will use this investment to buy shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, trousers and underwear for men and women.  With these items, her business will be stocked up for the Christmas season, when demand is higher.  Dora hopes to satisfy her customers' needs, increase sales, and improve her profits, which she will use to pay off her debt on time.

Dora dreams of giving her children something that she herself did not have: the opportunity to study and prosper.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, trousers and underwear.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio de  San Manuel, Cortes junto a un hermano.  Ella lleva 6 años de dedicarse al comercio para sostener a su familia. Vende mercadería como ser ropa, zapatos, mochilas, artículos para el hogar y otros.  La manera de vender es ambulante y por pedidos.  El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 5,000 Lempiras y es para comprar nuevo producto en ropa como blusas, pantalones, camisas y otra que le han pedido sus clientes para esta temporada navideña.  Su plan es aumentar las ventas y mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en: María is 58 years old, a single mother of four children, and lives with one of her brothers in the San Manuel municipality in Cortes.  For six years María has had a business in order to support her family.  She sells merchandise such as clothes, shoes, bags, and items for the home.  María is a street vendor and also takes orders.  María has applied for a loan of 5000 Lempira in order to buy new clothes such as blouses, shirts, trousers and other items that her customers have ordered for the Christmas season.  María's plan is to increase sales and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy new clothing products such as blouses, trousers, shirts and other items that her customers have ordered.

loans.name: Deysi Rubelina

texts.es:
Deysi, es casada, tiene dos hijos, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia, desde muy joven aprendió de sus padres la elaboración de petates, oficio que actualmente lo desempeña para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar, también se dedica a la crianza  de cerdos y ganado, por el momento no se le hace difícil realizar dichas actividades.
Con el capital ella comprará una vaca y tule que es la materia prima para elaborar los petates que luego vende por mayor, espera fortalecer el negocio, aumentar la producción, tener mejores ingresos con los que podrá cancelar las cuotas de la deuda y mejorara las condiciones de vida de su familia.
Sueña con tener los recursos necesarios para reparar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Deysi is married and has two children.  She lives with her husband and children in her own house.  From a young age, Deysi learned to make grass mats from her parents and she now carries out this activity in order to support her husband with household costs.  In addition, Deysi raises pigs and cattle and, for now, Deysi has not had any difficulties doing this work.

With this loan, Deysi will buy a cow and tule, the basic material she uses to make the grass mats.  She will sell the mats in bulk.  Deysi hopes to strengthen her business, increase production  and have a higher income with which to pay off this loan.  She also hopes to improve her and her family's living conditions.

Deysi's dream is to have the necessary income to repair her home.

loans.use: to buy a cow and tule.

loans.name: Kanzada

texts.ru: Канзаде 62 года, не замужем, одна воспитала 4 детей. Все дети женаты, находятся на заработках в России, только самый старший вместе со своей семьей проживает вместе с Канзадой, помогает матери по хозяйству. Остальные дети периодически высылают деньги на поддержание матери. У Канзады - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Канзада занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 34 года назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Канзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 2,0 ГА, на которой выращивает кукурузу и клевер для обеспечения скота кормами. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Канзада обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Канзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Kanzada is 62, unmarried, and raising 4 children.  All her children are married and are migrant workers in Russia except for her oldest, who lives with her and helps her with her daily chores.  Her other children periodically send money back home to help support their mother.  She has the equivalent of a high school education, and is a crop- and livestock farmer.  She first started raising livestock 34 years ago with 3,000 som worth of animals, and, thanks to her persistence, currently has 2 dairy cows and 2 hectares of land for growing corn and clover (which she uses to feed her cows), while her monthly income has risen to nearly 15,000 som.

To further develop her farm, Kanzada is seeking a loan from Bai Tushum & Partners to buy some bull calves, which she plans on raising and fattening to resell at a profit.  She hopes to use any future profits due to the loan to continue to buy even more livestock for her farm.

loans.use: buy cattle for fattening and resale

loans.name: Mwanahijah

texts.en:
Mwanahijah is a married woman with four school going children. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanahijah operates a food making business making consumables such as  beans and chapati (flat bread) for sale to passersby and neighbours. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase food items such as wheat flour, cooking oil, sugar and beans. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income and establish a restaurant in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase food items such as wheat flour, cooking oil, sugar and beans.

loans.name: Manuchehr

texts.ru: Манучехр родился  1994 года. После окончания школы советом родителей он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Экономический Университет. Данное время является студентом 2 курса. Он очень способный молодой человек. Манучехр увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает зарубежную литературу.  Родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в университете. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университет. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможем молодому человеку окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en:
Manuchehr was born in 1994. After finishing school, on the advice of his parents he enrolled in the Tajik State Economics University. Currently, he is a second year student. He is a very capable, young man. Manuchehr is interested in sports and in his spare time reads foreign literature.

His parents are not in a position to pay form his schooling in university. He is requesting a loan to pay tuition. This loan will help the young man to complete university and to achieve his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Alba Nancy

texts.es:
Alba es una mujer trabajadora y entregada a su familia, razón por la que decidió montar su propio negocio en la casa donde reside, con el ánimo de ser productiva al mismo tiempo que puede estar pendiente de sus 3 hijos. Es confeccionista desde hace 17 años, oficio que aprendió de su madre y adquirió experiencia trabajando en diferentes talleres y empresas pero, hace 10 años inició con su proyecto productivo independiente; produce todo tipo de prendas, pero especialmente camisas para dama, la producción que saca es vendida entre sus familiares, amigos y vecinos del sector y, además envía algunas prendas para otras ciudades donde le hacen encargos. Trabaja sola todos los días de 5 am a 6 pm y cuando es temporada alta contrata a otra persona para que le colabore.
Alba ha encontrado en los créditos el apoyo para hacer crecer su negocio y por ello realiza la solicitud, pues con el dinero comprará insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, accesorios, encajes, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener más variedad de insumos para satisfacer los diversos gustos de sus clientes, lo que aumentará sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe por su labor.
El sueño de Alba es montar un almacén en el que pueda vender sus producciones y además desea incursionar el sistema de maquila para generar mejores ingresos que le garanticen una estabilidad financiera con la que pueda brindar a sus hijos una educación de buena calidad y un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Alba is a hardworking woman who is dedicated to her family which is why she decided to set up her own business in her home, all with the intention of being productive at the same time as being there for her three children.

She has been a clothes manufacturer for 17 years, a trade which she learnt from her mother and she obtained experience working in different businesses and workshops, however, 10 years ago she started her own activity. She produces all kinds of clothes, but in particular blouses for women. The goods that she makes are sold to her relatives, friends and neighbors in the area. In addition, she sends some clothes to other cities where orders have been placed. She works alone every day from 5 am to 6 pm, and when it is peak period, she employs another person to help her.

Through these loans, Alba has found the support she needs to grow her business, and this is why she is making the request. Using this money, she will buy supplies in bulk (fabrics, threads, buttons, accessories, laces and so on). This will allow her to have a larger variety of supplies to meet the various requirements of her customers, which will increase her sales and the profits that she earns through her work.

Alba dreams of setting up a store in which she can sell her goods and she also wants to get involved in the assembly line to generate larger profits that will enable financial stability with which she can provide her children with an education of a good quality and a better wellness.

loans.use: to buy supplies in bulk (fabrics, threads, buttons, accessories, lace and so on).

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña María tiene 62 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa, junto a su esposo, dos hijas y un nieto. Hace 8 años que doña María se  dedicado a vender mercadería como ropa para damas, caballeros y niños mediante pedidos y entrega a domicilio, y en su casa también vende refrescos, churros, dulces y galletas. Ella anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de tortillas, es una señora muy emprendedora, siempre busca como obtener sus ingresos. Ha decidido solicitar un tercer préstamo a ODEF para mantener activo su negocio, el cual es por 4,000.00 lempiras y va comprar más refrescos, churros, dulces y ropa para incrementar su inventario y aumentar las ventas. Tiene como meta establecer el negocio en un local céntrico y ampliarlo más.
texts.en:
Doña María is 62 years old, married, has four children, and lives in the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa along with her husband, two daughters, and a grandson.  For eight years, Doña María has made a living selling merchandise like clothing for women, men, and children.  She takes orders and makes home deliveries.  She sells soft drinks, churros, sweets, and cookies from home.  Previously, she made a living selling tortillas.  She is a very enterprising woman; she is always looking for ways get income.  

She decided to request a third loan from ODEF in order to keep her business active.  The loan is for 4,000 lempiras, and she will use it to buy more soft drinks, churros, sweets, and clothing in order to increase her inventory and augment her sales.  Her goal is to set up the business in a place in the center of town and expand it more.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell like soft drinks, churros, sweets, and clothing in general.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen, age 44, is a married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has 4 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she availed herself of a 3rd loan of PKR 30,000 through Kashf Foundation to buy packs of grains, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of grains, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 44-years-old married woman and the mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Shehnaz’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Shehnaz has applied for a loan of PKR  30,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Shehnaz is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Lideres De Santa Rosa Group

texts.es: Julia  de 49 años es  casada con 03 hijos independientes, actualmente es socia del grupo “Líderes De Santa Rosa” constituida por 15 mujeres  responsables, que han ido mejorando a través de sus negocios. Este es el caso de Julia la cual se dedica a la venta de productos  de primera necesidad, en un mercado de su localidad. Se siente feliz pues con su trabajo sigue ayudando a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de abarrotes, bebidas y panetones,  pues lo piensa ofrecer por campaña navideña. Seguir implementando su negocio es su mayor anhelo. El grupo “Líderes De Santa Rosa” agradece  la ayuda brindada y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Julia se encuentra de pie, es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo morado. Elizabeth y Teodora no pudieron estar presentes por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Julia is 49 years old, married, and has three adult children.  She is a member of the “Líderes De Santa Rosa” group, made up of 15 responsible ladies who have been improving because of their businesses.

Julia sells primary needs products at a local market, is happy with her work, and continues to help her husband with the household expenses.  She will use the money from this loan to buy groceries, drinks, and pastries for the Christmas campaign.  Her greatest desire is to continue growing her business.

The “Líderes De Santa Rosa” group is grateful for the help and are committed to continue working well.  Julia is standing.  She is the second from the left, wearing a purple top.  Elizabeth and Teodora were not able to attend due to work commitments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Kuthea's Group

texts.en:
Kuthea is a 41-year-old mother of one kid living in Mongkol Borey in Banteay Meanchey province, Cambodia.

To feed the family, she is a wedding embellisher (decorator), and her husband has been a rice farmer for twenty-one years. These businesses return to her around 40,000 KHR per day. Kuthea is a borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for her first loan cycle. Now she leads a group of three, she and her group member, in applying for 3,600,000 KHR.

As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy more embellishment supplies for her business. She hopes her business will grow properly to improve her family’s situation and standard of living, and to earn extra income.

loans.use: to buy more embellishment supplies for her business

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Sabiha

texts.en:
Sabiha is a 41-year-old married woman. She has eight children.

Sabiha opened a salon in 2010, providing hair styling, cuts, coloring, face massages, make-up and beauty care to assist her husband in supporting their big family. Sabiha has one employee. To continue providing excellent service and to attract additional customers, she decided to upgrade her business.

Sabiha is requesting a loan to buy a face massage machine, chair and hair washing machine. She is aiming to increase business and change her salon to a beauty center.
